text: Slukhachi nepravdy, pohlynachi zaboronenoho! Yakshcho pryydutʹ vony do tebe, to rozsudy mizh nymy abo zh vidvernysya vid nykh. Yakshcho vidverneshsya ty vid nykh, to ne zashkodyatʹ vony tobi niyakym chynom. Yakshcho zh budesh sudyty yikh, to sudy mizh nymy spravedlyvo. Voistynu, Allah lyubytʹ spravedlyvykh
